CmdLine: echo 'deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial-security multiverse' >> /etc/apt/sources.list &&     echo 'deb-src http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ xenial-security multiverse' >> /etc/apt/sources.list &&     apt-get update && apt-get install -y autoconf     dh-autoreconf     gcc     libboost-all-dev     libc6     libc6-dev     libncurses5     libncurses5-dev     libpthread-stubs0-dev     libtool     make     python3-dev     python3-matplotlib     python3-numpy     python3-pip     python3-scipy     python3-sklearn     wget     zlib1g     zlib1g-dev &&     pip3 install --upgrade pip &&     pip3 install sphinx &&     wget https://github.com/samtools/samtools/releases/download/1.3.1/samtools-1.3.1.tar.bz2 &&     tar -xvjf samtools-1.3.1.tar.bz2 &&     rm samtools-1.3.1.tar.bz2 &&     cd samtools-1.3.1 &&     make &&     make install &&     export PATH=/samtools-1.3.1/bin:$PATH &&     cd / &&     wget https://github.com/maplesond/portcullis/releases/download/Release-1.0.0/portcullis-1.0.0.tar.gz &&     tar -xvzf portcullis-1.0.0.tar.gz &&     rm portcullis-1.0.0.tar.gz &&     cd portcullis-1.0.0 &&     ./configure &&     make &&     make install
Commands.Name: run
